privates.name: Dejimaya Yosuke Rickshaws
privates.description: Currently operating company may place a free token in Tokyo (E15) Token placement must be consistent with all other placement rules. Owning player must be president of of currently operating company. This action closes the private company

privates.name: Tsurumi Port Railway
privates.description: Currently operating company may place a tile in J12 for free in addition to normal tile placement, Owning player must be president of currently operating companu. This action closes the private.

privates.name: Tamako Railway
privates.description: Currently operating company may place up to 2 tiles in C7,D6 for free in addition to normal tile placement, Owning player must be president of currently operating companu. This action closes the private.

privates.name: Taishaku Handcar Tramway
privates.description: Currently operating company may place a tile in C17 for free in addition to normal tile placement, Owning player must be president of currently operating companu. This action closes the private.

privates.name: Teito Electric Railway
privates.description: Currently operating company may place up to 2 tiles in E9,F10 for free in addition to normal tile placement, Owning player must be president of currently operating companu. This action closes the private.

privates.name: Tokyo Municipal Electric Bureau
privates.description: Exchanged for 10% share of the JNR during the National Railway formation.

companies.name: Ministry of Industry Railway Bureau (+Presidents of JNR when formed Cost: ¥260, Treasury: ¥120 & 2-Train)
Nippon Railway - Tohoku Main Line (exchange for 5% of JNR when formed)
Tamagawa Aqueduct Narrowboat (exchange for 10% of JNR when formed)
Kobu Railway (exchange for 5% of JNR when formed)
Nippon Railway - Toshima Line (exchange for 5% of JNR when formed)
Sobu Railway (exchange for 5% of JNR when formed)
Daishi Electric Railway (+Directors share of KR. Closed: 60% of KR sold. [Transfer assets, replace token, 8xPar])

phases.notes: Trains can only be bought from the bank or bank pool.

phases.name: 3E
phases.notes: Companies may purchase trains from other companies.

phases.name: 5E
phases.notes: JNR established. Privates Close. Late Minors available next SR. Minor 7 closed immediately. All trains and funds are returned to the bank. Token is left and blocks Kawasaki (I11). If Keikyū is established it only recieves 8xPar

phases.name: 6E
phases.notes: Late Minor Trains do not Rust.

phases.name: 3E
phases.notes: Companies may purchase trains from each other

notes.note: Shares in the market pay dividends to the bank
No more than 50% of a corporation's shares may be in the market at any time
Shares in a company cannot be sold until that company has operated
Late Minors can only be sold if someone other than the director holds the 50% share.

turns.name: Stock Round
steps: Buy one share OR after phase 5E buy a Late Minor Charter

turns.name: Operating order
optional: Companies operate in the following order:

legend.description: Shares of this corporation do not count toward the certificate limit
